page.title: 15BIRDS AROUND PORTESSIE
page.content: THE BEST PLACE AROUND HERE FOR BIRDS AND THEIR NESTS IS AT THE PLANTAIN UP IN RATHVEN. THERE ARE BLUE TITS, YELLOW HAMMERS AND COAL TITS. THERE IS ONE SPARROW HAWK'S NEST UP THE PLANTAIN AND ABOVE IT IN THE TREES THERE IS A RAVEN'S NEST WITH THREE CHICKS. THEY ARE JUST ABOUT READY TO FLY. I LIKE TO WATCH THE MOTHER BIRD FEEDING HER CHICKS. I KNOW WHERE THERE ARE TWO WRENS' NESTS. THERE IS ONE NEST WITH THREE EGGS AND ONE WITH TWO EGGS. YESTERDAY, I SAW THAT ALL THE EGGS HAD HATCHED. THE NESTS ARE VERY DIFFICULT TO FIND AND THE ONLY WAY THAT I SAW THEM WAS TO FOLLOW THE BIRDS TO THE SIDE OF THE BURN. WHEN I WAS LOOKING FOR GOLF BALLS I FOUND A YELLOW HAMMER'S NEST WITH FOUR YOUNG DUG INTO THE BANK SURROUNDED BY NETTLES.{BY STEVEN COULL
